subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Mathematics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: In trying to predict outcomes for The New York Times’s bracket challenge, a Davidson professor and his students gave weight to the unequal payoffs to be gained from backing favorites or underdogs.
snippet: In trying to predict outcomes for The New York Times’s bracket challenge, a Davidson professor and his students gave weight to the unequal payoffs to be gained from backing favorites or underdogs.
